climbs.name: My Wife is an Alien
climbs.fa: Todd Swain, Peggy Buckey, 9-88. FFA: Bob Gaines 10-1988.

content.description:
This climbs the steep face to the left of "Hodgepodge".

Climb up and left past five bolts, then up and right to the top.
Climb buckets to the right of "Hodgepodge" to a very short thin crack and past a bolt.
content.protection: Bolt, or top rope. A small cam may work in the crack.

climbs.name: Ligamentor Seconds in Vans
climbs.fa: Mark Maynard, Craig Service, Mark Rosebrough, 11-1988

content.description: Climb "Hodgepodge" to a crack diagonaling to the right. Follow this to the top.

climbs.name: Hot Tub Honey
climbs.fa: Louie Anderson, David Larsen & Daina Larsen, 4/90

content.description: This route starts to the far right of Hodgepodge 5.4. It is a short,not very fun route and the way off is a short rap off of two bolts above another bolted job on the other side. It was in the shade in early afternoon so it was cooler. The two routes behind it (Names ukn to me) are much more fun. So in a small area there can be a good warm up and such. Good bolts! three bolts..........
content.protection: 3 bolts, pro for anchors up top (Medium cams)

content.description:
This is not a route to lead, unless you're prepared to solo it.  However, as a toprope, it is popular with institutions due to it's north-facing aspect.

Take the path of least resistance up the featured face.

Descent: scramble off to the west (some downclimbing).
content.protection: None if leading.  For toproping: large hexes (or cams), thread-through, long webbing.  2 new bolts on the top of the formation can be extended and used.
